CustomField.description: This contains the file name for the related content.
CustomField.formula: IF(((LEFT(SBQQ__ExternalId__c , 3) = '015') || (LEFT(SBQQ__ExternalId__c , 3) = '00P')), HYPERLINK("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=" & SBQQ__ExternalId__c, "View Document in New Window"), IF(LEFT(SBQQ__ExternalId__c , 3) = '069', HYPERLINK("/sfc/#version?selectedDocumentId=" & SBQQ__ExternalId__c, "View Content Workspace in New Window"), "Not Document or workspace ID Specified"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter a file name for the related content.
CustomField.label: Document Name
